#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int n;
		cin>>n;
		int v[100005];
	
		for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
			cin>>v[i];
		if(n==2)
		{
			cout<<v[2]<<endl;
			continue;
		}
		int a[100005] = {0};
		long long lsum = 0;
		for(int i=2;i<=n;i++)
		{
			if(a[i] == 1)
				continue;
			long long sum =0 ;
			for(int j=i;j<=n;j = j+i)
			{
				sum+= v[j];
				a[j] = 1;
			}
			if(sum > lsum)
				lsum = sum;
		}
		cout<<lsum<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
